Here is some documentation/cookbook examples about how to use the Hierarchical Atomic Resolution Perception (HARP) package.



# Get Started with `harpcalc`
1. Install HARP

2. Activate the HARP environment (`conda activate harp` or `source harpenv/bin/activate`; see above)

3. use the CLI (using PDB ID 6J6J as an example; see tutorial on documentation website):
``` bash
harpcalc -id 6j6j
```
